特記事項:
授業実施日程：
2023年9月4日(月)～8日(金)※予備日9月9日(土)
１限(9:00～10:40)、2限(10:50～12:30）、3限(13:10～14:50) ※最終日は2限で終了

本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Students work with other students to complete various discussion and presentation activities.

第1回:
“All sessions are conducted Face to face”
Day 1 - Introductions; Course Explanation; Classroom Language; Project Explanation
第2回: Day 2 - Listening, Reading, Discussion Activities; Research Question Creation
第3回: Day 3 - Listening, Reading, Discussion Activities; Data Acquisition Practice
第4回: Day 4 - Listening, Reading, Discussion Activities; Data Acquisition; Poster Production; Presentation Practice
トピック.授業計画1: Note: This syllabus may be subject to revisions according to student needs and abilities.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be required to do homework

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
評価.成績評価Grading2:
備考　Note
ATTENDANCE is required
If you miss 3 class periods, you will NOT receive credit for this course.
If you are late one class period, you will lose 1 percentage point
If you miss one class period, you will lose 2 percentage points
評価.備考Note0: This is an all-English classroom. You greatly enhance the development of your English skills by speaking it. In addition, speaking Japanese limits your classmates' learning opportunities. Therefore, members of the class are encouraged to support each other while using English.
